* "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia," upon release, was listed as Explicit on Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, and Tidal. As of November 2022, the label has been removed from all platforms except Tidal. "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" is the only ''Genshin Impact'' soundtrack to be listed as Explicit.
